item.text: Now Abimelech son of Jerub Baal went to Shechem to see his mother’s relatives. He said to them and to his mother’s entire extended family,

“<st data-num="01696 04994 0241">Tell</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="01167" class="">leaders</st> of <st data-num="07927" class="">Shechem</st> this: ‘<st data-num="04100" class="">Why</st> would you <st data-num="02896" class="">want</st><n id="2" /> to have <st data-num="07657" class="">70</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="03378" class="">Jerub Baal’s</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>, <st data-num="04910" class="">ruling</st> over you <st data-num="0518" class="">when</st> you can have just <st data-num="0376 0259">one</st> <st data-num="04910" class="">ruler</st>? <st data-num="02142" class="">Recall</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> am your own <st data-num="01320" class="">flesh</st> and <st data-num="06106" class="">blood.’</st>”<n id="3" />

His <st data-num="0517" class="">mother’s</st> <st data-num="0251" class="">relatives</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01696" class="">spoke</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> his <st data-num="05921" class="">behalf</st> <st data-num="0241" class="">to</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="01167" class="">leaders</st> of <st data-num="07927" class="">Shechem</st> and reported <st data-num="03605 01697 0428">his proposal</st>.<n id="3" /> The <st data-num="03820" class="">leaders</st> were <st data-num="05186" class="">drawn</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">to</st> <st data-num="040" class="">Abimelech</st>;<n id="4" /> they <st data-num="03588 0559">said</st>, “<st data-num="01931" class="">He</st> is our <st data-num="0251" class="">close relative</st>.”<n id="5" />

They <st data-num="05414" class="">paid</st> him <st data-num="07657" class="">70</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> shekels out of the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st> of <st data-num="01170" class="">Baal Berith</st>. <st data-num="040" class="">Abimelech</st> then used the silver to <st data-num="07936" class="">hire</st> some <st data-num="07386" class="">lawless</st>, <st data-num="06348" class="">dangerous</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0582" class="">men</st> as his <st data-num="01980 0310">followers</st>.<n id="2" />

He <st data-num="0935" class="">went</st> to his <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">home</st> in <st data-num="06084" class="">Ophrah</st> and <st data-num="02026" class="">murdered</st> his <st data-num="0251" class="">half brothers</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="07657 0376">70</st> legitimate<n id="2" /> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> of <st data-num="03378" class="">Jerub Baal</st>, <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="068" class="">stone</st>. Only <st data-num="03147" class="">Jotham</st>, <st data-num="03378" class="">Jerub Baal’s</st> <st data-num="06996" class="">youngest</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st>, <st data-num="03498" class="">escaped</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> he <st data-num="02244" class="">hid</st>.
All the leaders of Shechem and Beth Millo assembled and then went and made Abimelech king by the oak near the pillar in Shechem.
When Jotham heard the news, he went and stood on the top of Mount Gerizim. He spoke loudly to the people below, “Listen to me, leaders of Shechem, so that God may listen to you!
“The trees were determined to go out and choose a king for themselves. They said to the olive tree, ‘Be our king!’
But the olive tree said to them, ‘I am not going to stop producing my oil, which is used to honor gods and men, just to sway above the other trees!’
“So the trees said to the fig tree, ‘You come and be our king!’
But the fig tree said to them, ‘I am not going to stop producing my sweet figs, my excellent fruit, just to sway above the other trees!’
“So the trees said to the grapevine, ‘You come and be our king!’
But the grapevine said to them, ‘I am not going to stop producing my wine, which makes gods and men so happy, just to sway above the other trees!’
“So all the trees said to the thornbush, ‘You come and be our king!’

The thornbush said to the trees, ‘If you really want to choose me as your king, then come along, find safety under my branches. Otherwise may fire blaze from the thornbush and consume the cedars of Lebanon!’
“Now, if you have shown loyalty and integrity when you made Abimelech king, if you have done right to Jerub Baal and his family, if you have properly repaid him—

my <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="0834 03898">fought</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">for</st> you; he <st data-num="07993 05048">risked</st> his <st data-num="05315" class="">life</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="05337" class="">delivered</st> you from <st data-num="04080" class="">Midian’s</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">power</st>.<n id="2" />

But <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> have <st data-num="06965 05921">attacked</st><n id="1" /> my <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">family</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="03117" class="">today</st>. You <st data-num="02026" class="">murdered</st> his <st data-num="07657 0376">70</st> legitimate<n id="3" /> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="068" class="">stone</st> and <st data-num="04427" class="">made</st> <st data-num="040" class="">Abimelech</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of his <st data-num="0519" class="">female slave</st>, <st data-num="04427" class="">king</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> the <st data-num="01167" class="">leaders</st> of <st data-num="07927" class="">Shechem</st> just <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> is your <st data-num="0251" class="">close relative</st>.<n id="4" />

So <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> you have <st data-num="06213" class="">shown</st> <st data-num="0571" class="">loyalty</st> and <st data-num="08549" class="">integrity</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03378" class="">Jerub Baal</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">and</st> his <st data-num="01004" class="">family</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03117 02088">today</st>, then may <st data-num="040" class="">Abimelech</st> bring you <st data-num="08055" class="">happiness</st> <st data-num="01571" class="">and</st> may you bring <st data-num="01931" class="">him</st> <st data-num="08055" class="">happiness</st>!<n id="2" />

But <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> <st data-num="0369" class="">not</st>, may <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">blaze</st> from <st data-num="040" class="">Abimelech</st> and <st data-num="0398" class="">consume</st> the <st data-num="01167" class="">leaders</st> of <st data-num="07927" class="">Shechem</st> and <st data-num="01004" class="">Beth</st> <st data-num="04407" class="">Millo</st>! May <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st> also <st data-num="03318" class="">blaze</st> from the <st data-num="01167" class="">leaders</st> of <st data-num="07927" class="">Shechem</st> and <st data-num="01004" class="">Beth</st> <st data-num="04407" class="">Millo</st> and <st data-num="0398" class="">consume</st> <st data-num="040" class="">Abimelech</st>!”
Then Jotham ran away to Beer and lived there to escape from Abimelech his half-brother.
Abimelech commanded Israel for three years.

<st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> a <st data-num="07307" class="">spirit</st> to stir up <st data-num="07451" class="">hostility</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> <st data-num="040" class="">Abimelech</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="01167" class="">leaders</st> of <st data-num="07927" class="">Shechem</st>. He made the <st data-num="01167" class="">leaders</st> of <st data-num="07927" class="">Shechem</st> <st data-num="0898" class="">disloyal</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="040" class="">Abimelech</st>.

He did this so the <st data-num="02555" class="">violent</st> deaths of <st data-num="03378" class="">Jerub Baal’s</st> <st data-num="07657" class="">70</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> might be <st data-num="0935" class="">avenged</st> and <st data-num="040" class="">Abimelech</st>, their <st data-num="0251" class="">half-brother</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="02026" class="">murdered</st> them, might have to <st data-num="07760 05921">pay</st> for their <st data-num="01818" class="">spilled blood</st>, <st data-num="05921" class="">along with</st> the <st data-num="01167" class="">leaders</st> of <st data-num="07927" class="">Shechem</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="02388" class="">helped</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">him</st> <st data-num="02026" class="">murder</st> <st data-num="0251" class="">them</st>.<n id="2" />
The leaders of Shechem rebelled against Abimelech by putting bandits in the hills, who robbed everyone who traveled by on the road. But Abimelech found out about it.
Gaal son of Ebed came through Shechem with his brothers. The leaders of Shechem transferred their loyalty to him.

They <st data-num="03318" class="">went out</st> to the <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st>, <st data-num="01219" class="">harvested</st> their <st data-num="03754" class="">grapes</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01869" class="">squeezed out</st> the juice,<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="06213 01974">celebrated</st>. They <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> to the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st><n id="3" /> of their <st data-num="0430" class="">god</st> and <st data-num="0398" class="">ate</st>, <st data-num="08354" class="">drank</st>, and <st data-num="07043" class="">cursed</st> <st data-num="040" class="">Abimelech</st>.

<st data-num="01603" class="">Gaal</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05651" class="">Ebed</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="04310" class="">Who</st> is <st data-num="040" class="">Abimelech</st> and <st data-num="04310" class="">who</st> is <st data-num="07927" class="">Shechem</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> we should <st data-num="05647" class="">serve</st> him? Is he <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="03378" class="">Jerub Baal</st>, and is not <st data-num="02083" class="">Zebul</st> the <st data-num="06496" class="">deputy</st> he appointed?<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05647" class="">Serve</st> the <st data-num="0376" class="">sons</st> of <st data-num="02544" class="">Hamor</st>, the <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="07927" class="">Shechem</st>! But <st data-num="04069" class="">why</st> should <st data-num="0587" class="">we</st> <st data-num="05647" class="">serve</st> Abimelech?<n id="2" />
If only these men were under my command, I would get rid of Abimelech!” He challenged Abimelech, “Muster your army and come out for battle!”
When Zebul, the city commissioner, heard the words of Gaal son of Ebed, he was furious.

He <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="04397" class="">messengers</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="040" class="">Abimelech</st>, who was in <st data-num="08649" class="">Arumah</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">reporting</st>, “<st data-num="02009" class="">Beware</st>!<n id="2" /> <st data-num="01603" class="">Gaal</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05651" class="">Ebed</st> and his <st data-num="0251" class="">brothers</st> are <st data-num="0935" class="">coming</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="07927" class="">Shechem</st> and <st data-num="02009 06696">inciting</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> to rebel <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> you.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st>, <st data-num="06965" class="">come up</st><n id="1" /> at <st data-num="03915" class="">night</st> <st data-num="0859 05971 0834 0854">with your men</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="0693" class="">set an ambush</st> in the <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st> outside the city.<n id="3" />
In the morning at sunrise quickly attack the city. When he and his men come out to fight you, do what you can to him.”
So Abimelech and all his men came up at night and set an ambush outside Shechem; they divided into four units.

When <st data-num="01603" class="">Gaal</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05651" class="">Ebed</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">came out</st> and <st data-num="05975" class="">stood</st> at the <st data-num="06607" class="">entrance</st> to the <st data-num="05892" class="">city’s</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st>, <st data-num="040" class="">Abimelech</st> and <st data-num="0834 0854">his</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">men</st> <st data-num="06965" class="">got up</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> their <st data-num="03993" class="">hiding places</st>.

<st data-num="01603" class="">Gaal</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">men</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02083" class="">Zebul</st>, “<st data-num="02009" class="">Look</st>, <st data-num="05971" class="">men</st> are <st data-num="03381" class="">coming down</st> from the <st data-num="07218" class="">tops</st> of the <st data-num="02022" class="">hills</st>.” But <st data-num="02083" class="">Zebul</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, “<st data-num="0859" class="">You</st> are <st data-num="07200" class="">seeing</st> the <st data-num="06738" class="">shadows</st> on the <st data-num="02022" class="">hills</st>—it just looks like <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st>.”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="01603" class="">Gaal</st> <st data-num="03254 05750">again</st> <st data-num="01696 0559">said</st>, “<st data-num="02009" class="">Look</st>, <st data-num="05971" class="">men</st> are <st data-num="03381" class="">coming down</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">from</st> the very <st data-num="02872" class="">center</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>. <st data-num="0259" class="">A</st> <st data-num="07218" class="">unit</st><n id="2" /> is <st data-num="0935" class="">coming</st> by <st data-num="01870" class="">way</st> of the <st data-num="0436" class="">Oak Tree</st> of the <st data-num="06049" class="">Diviners</st>.”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="02083" class="">Zebul</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, “<st data-num="0346" class="">Where</st> <st data-num="0645" class="">now</st> are your <st data-num="06310 0834">bragging</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">words</st>,<n id="1" /> ‘<st data-num="04310" class="">Who</st> is <st data-num="040" class="">Abimelech</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> we should <st data-num="05647" class="">serve</st> him?’ Are <st data-num="02088" class="">these</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> the <st data-num="05971 0834">men</st><n id="2" /> you <st data-num="03988" class="">insulted</st>?<n id="3" /> <st data-num="03318 04994">Go out</st> <st data-num="06258" class="">now</st> and <st data-num="03898" class="">fight</st> them!”

So <st data-num="01603" class="">Gaal</st> <st data-num="03318 06440">led</st> the <st data-num="01167" class="">leaders</st> of <st data-num="07927" class="">Shechem</st> <st data-num="03318 06440">out</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03898" class="">fought</st> <st data-num="040" class="">Abimelech</st>.

<st data-num="040" class="">Abimelech</st> <st data-num="07291" class="">chased</st> him, and Gaal<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05127" class="">ran</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">from</st> him. <st data-num="07227" class="">Many</st> Shechemites<n id="2" /> <st data-num="05307" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="02491" class="">wounded</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="06607" class="">entrance</st> of the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st>.
Abimelech went back to Arumah; Zebul drove Gaal and his brothers out of Shechem.
The next day the Shechemites came out to the field. When Abimelech heard about it,

he <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> his <st data-num="05971" class="">men</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="02673" class="">divided</st> them into <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="07218" class="">units</st> and <st data-num="0693" class="">set an ambush</st> in the <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st>. When he <st data-num="07200 02009">saw</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">coming out</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>,<n id="2" /> he <st data-num="06965 05921">attacked</st> and <st data-num="05221" class="">struck</st> them <st data-num="05221" class="">down</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="040" class="">Abimelech</st> and <st data-num="0834 05973">his</st> <st data-num="07218" class="">units</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="06584" class="">attacked</st> and <st data-num="05975" class="">blocked</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="06607" class="">entrance</st> to the <st data-num="05892" class="">city’s</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st>. <st data-num="08147" class="">Two</st> <st data-num="07218" class="">units</st> then <st data-num="06584 05921">attacked</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0834" class="">people</st> in the <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st> and <st data-num="05221" class="">struck</st> them <st data-num="05221" class="">down</st>.
Abimelech fought against the city all that day. He captured the city and killed all the people in it. Then he leveled the city and spread salt over it.
When all the leaders of the Tower of Shechem heard the news, they went to the stronghold of the temple of El Berith.

<st data-num="040" class="">Abimelech</st> <st data-num="05046" class="">heard</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="01167" class="">leaders</st> of the <st data-num="04026" class="">Tower</st> of <st data-num="07927" class="">Shechem</st> <st data-num="06908" class="">were in one place</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="040 01931">He</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0834 0854">his</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">men</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05927" class="">went up</st> on <st data-num="02022" class="">Mount</st> <st data-num="06756" class="">Zalmon</st>. <st data-num="040" class="">He</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> an <st data-num="07134" class="">ax</st><n id="3" /> in his <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st> and <st data-num="03772" class="">cut off</st> a <st data-num="06086" class="">tree</st> <st data-num="07754" class="">branch</st>. He <st data-num="07760" class="">put</st> it<n id="4" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> his <st data-num="07926" class="">shoulder</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0834 05973">his</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">men</st>, “<st data-num="04116" class="">Quickly</st>, <st data-num="06213 03644">do</st> <st data-num="04100" class="">what</st> you have just <st data-num="07200" class="">seen</st> me <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st>!”<n id="5" />

So each of his men also cut off a branch and followed Abimelech. They put the branches against the stronghold and set fire to it. All the people of the Tower of Shechem died—about 1,000 men and women.
Abimelech moved on to Thebez; he besieged and captured it.

There <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="05797" class="">fortified</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04026" class="">tower</st><n id="2" /> in the <st data-num="08432" class="">center</st> of the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>, so <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0582" class="">men</st> and <st data-num="0802" class="">women</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">as well as</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city’s</st> <st data-num="01167" class="">leaders</st>, <st data-num="05127" class="">ran</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">into it</st> and <st data-num="05462" class="">locked</st> <st data-num="01157" class="">the entrance</st>. Then they <st data-num="05927" class="">went up</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="01406" class="">roof</st> of the <st data-num="04026" class="">tower</st>.

<st data-num="040" class="">Abimelech</st> <st data-num="0935 05704">came</st> and <st data-num="03898" class="">attacked</st> the <st data-num="04026" class="">tower</st>. When he <st data-num="05066 05704">approached</st> the <st data-num="06607" class="">entrance</st> of the <st data-num="04026" class="">tower</st> to <st data-num="08313" class="">set</st> it on <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st>,

<st data-num="0259" class="">a</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="07993" class="">threw</st> an <st data-num="07393" class="">upper</st> <st data-num="06400" class="">millstone</st><n id="1" /> down <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> <st data-num="040" class="">his</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="07218" class="">head</st> and <st data-num="07533" class="">shattered</st> his <st data-num="01538" class="">skull</st>.

He <st data-num="04120" class="">quickly</st> <st data-num="07121 0559">called</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="05288" class="">young man</st> who <st data-num="05375" class="">carried</st> his <st data-num="03627" class="">weapons</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="08025" class="">Draw</st> your <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st> and <st data-num="04191" class="">kill</st> me, <st data-num="06435" class="">so</st> they will <st data-num="06435" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>,<n id="2" /> ‘A <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="02026" class="">killed</st> him.’” So the <st data-num="05288" class="">young man</st> <st data-num="01856" class="">stabbed</st> him and he <st data-num="04191" class="">died</st>.
When the Israelites saw that Abimelech was dead, they went home.
God repaid Abimelech for the evil he did to his father by murdering his 70 half brothers.
God also repaid the men of Shechem for their evil deeds. The curse spoken by Jotham son of Jerub Baal fell on them.
